main.name: Cody Chinn
main.bio: As a technology enthusiast I strive to continue learning everything I can about the latest and greatest tech. My curiousity has stretched from Arduino and Raspberry Pi Projects to Mobile App and API development.
main.contactmessage: I'm always willing to help! Just reach out and I'll get back to you as soon as I can.

resume.skillmessage: Jack of All Trades, Master of Mobile

work.title: Associate Applications Engineer
work.description: After completeling an internship through the summer of 2019, Steelcase hired me in the Innovation Management Office to help the company explore new and emerging technologies.

work.title: Level 1 HelpDesk Intern
work.description: Assisted with HelpDesk tickets which included system management, installing computers on the factory floor and troubleshooting general technical issues to service the rest of the company.

work.title: Level 1 HelpDesk Intern
work.description: Assited students and professors on campus with a variety of issues. From network troubleshooting to password resets, the HelpDesk was a great starting point for my career in IT.

projects.title: Arduino Sarias Song
projects.category: Small Arduino Project to play Sarias song on loop with lights to match the notes
